Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • AI

  • public class AI
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls my Enemies movement and attacks
    Author:
    elan
    See Also:
    Enemy, Boss, EnemyBullet, HomingBullet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AI() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void basicEnemyAI()
      Controls the movement of all basic enemies, i.e.
      static void basicEnemyShoot()
      Causes a random enemy on the screen to shoot
      static void bossAI()
      Controls the movement of the Bosses, i.e.
      static void bossShoot()
      Causes the Boss to activate his shoot method
      static void enemyAI()
      Decides which Enemies are on the screen and calls the applicable AI function to control them
      static void initializeEnemies()
      Spawns My Enemies at the beginning of each level, Checks fields in the Level class to determine which enemies to spanw and how many

    • Method Detail

      • initializeEnemies

        public static void initializeEnemies()
        Spawns My Enemies at the beginning of each level, Checks fields in the Level class to determine which enemies to spanw and how many

      • enemyAI

        public static void enemyAI()
        Decides which Enemies are on the screen and calls the applicable AI function to control them

      • basicEnemyAI

        public static void basicEnemyAI()
        Controls the movement of all basic enemies, i.e. making them move from one side of the screen to the other and down every time the reach a side
        See Also:
        Enemy

      • basicEnemyShoot

        public static void basicEnemyShoot()
        Causes a random enemy on the screen to shoot
        See Also:
        EnemyBullet, HomingBullet

      • bossShoot

        public static void bossShoot()
        Causes the Boss to activate his shoot method
        See Also:
        Boss

      • bossAI

        public static void bossAI()
        Controls the movement of the Bosses, i.e. making them move from one side of the screen to the other and Rotate
        See Also:
        Boss
